alert-email-template::case-type::subject.html_body:
{{ "now"|date("d-M-Y") }}

Dear {{ case.values.resident_first_name.value }} {{ case.values.last_name_1.value }},
Thank you for your Subject Access Request under the Data Protection Act 1998. The reference number is {{ case.reference }}.

Thank you for providing your proof of identification. We will verify the documents received and if we require further information from you, we will let you know. Once we have verified the documents, your request will be actioned by the relevant Service Area team. The Council has 40 calendar days to respond to your request, as required by the Data Protection Act 1998. If you need more information, please fisit the Council's website at: https://www.hounslow.gov.uk/info/20110/open_data_and_information_requests/1365/data_protection

 

Kind Regards

Customer Relations
alert-email-template::case-type::subject.subject: Auto acknowledgement of Subject Access Request

alert-email-template::case-type::subject.html_body:
{{ "now"|date("d-M-Y") }}

Dear {{ case.values.resident_first_name.value }} {{ case.values.last_name_1.value }},

Data Protection Act 1998 – Subject Access Request

Thank you for your Subject Access Request of [enter date of receipt].  You requested the following information:

{{ case.values.description.value }}

Response:

{{ case.values.response.value }}

 

The response to your request has been dealt with under the Data Protection Act 1998.

 

There is no formal review process for Data Protection requests.  However if you do not feel that the Council has dealt with your request appropriately, please contact dataprotection@hounslow.gov.uk

 

If you remain dissatisfied with the handling of your request, you can contact the Information Commissioner at the following address:

 

Information Commissioner’s Office

Wycliffe House

Water Lane

Wilmslow

Cheshire SK9 5AF

Yours sincerely,
